About Me

Here's a bit about myself and what I do:

I am a highly motivated and results-oriented Front-End Web Developer with a detailed history of working collaboratively to deliver results. I’m familiar with various front-end technologies as well as troubleshooting and maintenance, client relations, and more.

I hold a certificate in Web Programming from Harvard University in addition to a Bachelor of Arts in Music and other trainings, and I remain steadfastly abreast of new tools and technologies. After a successful career as a Photographer and QA Tester, I turned my attention to web development and haven’t looked back.

Over the past couple years, I have learned to leverage certain front-end technologies to produce, maintain, and/or modify applications, landing pages, and portfolio sites. I’ve worked with clients and developed the format and design of websites. And I’m proficient with code with a variety of languages, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python.

Here we are, and I'm excited to apply my web development skills to your next project!

Harvard University (edx.org)

I have earned a professional certificate in computer science for web programming through Harvard University. This was a 6 month self-paced program which consisted of the classes CS50 & CS50 web.

Other Web Development Classes

  • Intro to Programming - Epicodus
  • Modern HTML & CSS From the Beginning - Udemy
  • Modern Javascript From the Beginning - Udemy

B.A. in Music

I have earned a bachelor of arts degree in music from the University of Oregon.
